GK16visa05cu:4: (vi, ka) vyaṅgyabhedāt kāvyabhedasya uktatvād vyaṅgyasya ca vyañjanāvṛttigamyatvād vyañjanāṃ pṛcchati---atha keyamiti /
GK16visa05cu:30: yatra ca svaśabdenābhidhānaṃ tatra pratyuta doṣa eveti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:33: abhihitānvayavādibhiraṅgīkṛtā tātparyākhyā vṛttirapi saṃsargamātre parikṣīṇā na vyaṅghyabodhinī /
GK16visa05cu:37: nanu rasādirabhidhayaiva bodhyatām ityata āhana ca saṃketita iti /
GK16visa05cu:38: nanu vibhāvādibhireva rasādibhāvādiḥ saṃketita eva ityatrāhana hīti /
GK16visa05cu:48: rasādirapi kathaṃ na saṃketita ityāśaṅkyāha---na ceti /
GK16visa05cu:51: yadi rasādeḥ saṃketitatvamucyate tat kiṃ vibhāvādivācakena śabdena ?
GK16visa05cu:54: svaśabdābhidhāne ca na tasya pratītiḥ kintu doṣa eva /
GK16visa05cu:58: mūrtimāniva madhau mugdho hariḥ kīḍatī“tyādau ca vibhāvādisāmagrayādeva tadvyañjakatvam na tu śṛṅgārādiśabdasya /
GK16visa05cu:64: (vi, gha) ubhayasiddhavācyārthasya bodhikā śaktirūpā vṛttireva vyaṅgyabodhikā,
GK16visa05cu:65_0: yathā dhanurdharamuktena iṣuṇā pratisaṃhitamekaṃ lakṣyaṃ dīrgheṇa vegarūpavyāpāreṇa
GK16visa05cu:65_1: bhittvā apratisaṃhitaṃ lakṣyāntaramapi dīrgatarībhūtena tenaiva vegarūpavyāpāreṇa
GK16visa05cu:66: yacca tātparyavṛttireva vyaṅgyabodhikā iti dhvanikasya matam,
GK16visa05cu:68: so 'yamityabhidhaiva vyaṅgyabodhiketi yat kaiściduktaṃ tatra so 'yamityabhidhānarūpeṣorvyāpāra ivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:71: ayamarthaḥ--yathā khalu dhanuṣmatā mukto bāṇa ekenaiva vegarūpavyāpāreṇa śatroḥ kavacādikamanekaṃ bhinatti,
GK16visa05cu:72: tathaika eva śabdasya vyāpāro yāvaduddeśyaṃ bodhayati /
GK16visa05cu:80: (vi, ṅa) yacca dhvaniketi---tātparyavyatirekāditi---vyañjakatvasya vyañjanāyāstātparyātatiriktatvād asau naṃ dhvanirna vyañjanā,
GK16visa05cu:92: tayorupari “śabdabuddhikarmaṇāṃ viramya vyāpārābhāvaḥ” iti vādibhireva pātanīyo daṇḍaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:98: kramaśo bodhe ca tatsattve viramya vyāpārabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:101: tātparyasattve vṛttibheda eva viramya vyāpāraḥ svīkriyate,
GK16visa05cu:102: na tu ekayā vṛttyā iti cenna /
GK16visa05cu:105: tasmāt kramaśo bodhena tātparyagrāhakābhāva eva tayorupari doṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:108: kramaśo vyañjanayā bodhane tu vaktṛboddhavāyadivaiśiṣṭyameva tātparyagrāhakam /
GK16visa05cu:109: na caivaṃ tadgrāhitaṃ tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ dhvanikamate vṛttirastu,
GK16visa05cu:111: yathā vā “surabhimāṃsaṃ bhuṅkṣva “iti sugandhimāṃsatātparyake vākye dhenumāṃsavyañjanā /
GK16visa05cu:124: (lo, ṛ) evaṃ ca yadi śabdaśruteranantaraṃ yāvānartho 'vagamyate tāvati śabdasyābhidhā eva vāyapāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:130: kanyā te garbhiṇī” ityādāvapi harṣaśokādīnāmapi na vācyatvam /
GK16visa05cu:133: (vi, ja) nanu na aṅgīkāryaiva lakṣaṇā ityata āha---kimiti ceti /
GK16visa05cu:146: tataśca kāvyaśabdānāṃ niratiśayasukhāsvādavyatirekeṇa pratipādyapratipādakayoḥ pravṛttyaupayikaprayojanānupalabdherniratiśayamukhāsvāda eva kāryatvenāvadhāryate /
GK16visa05cu:147: “yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ” iti nyāyāt” iti /
GK16visa05cu:150: (vi, jha) yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ “iti jaiminivākyameva vyaṅgyabodhane tātparyākhyavṛttau pramāṇamiti mataṃ dūṣayitumutthāpayati---yatpunariti /
GK16visa05cu:156: tathā ca sukhāsvādakāraṇatā kāvyavākyasya vyaṅgyabodhadvāreṇaiva etadvākyasya vyaṅgyatātparyakatvāt /
GK16visa05cu:159: kāvyaprakāśe tu asya vākyasya bhinna evārthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:160: tathā hi--“yatparo yatsādhyatātparyakaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdasya prāmāṇyaniyāmakor'thaḥ na tu siddhaṃśe tasya śabdasya prāmāṇyam“iti /
GK16visa05cu:161: yathā,“gāmabhyāja“ityatra sādhyāṃśo 'bhyājanaṃ prāmāṇyaniyāmakor'tho na tu siddhagavāṃśaḥ; yathā vā,
GK16visa05cu:166: “yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ “iti vādino matamāśaṅkya dūṣayati---yatpunara iti /
GK16visa05cu:175: tasmānniratiśayasukhāsvādarūpo rasādirūpor'thaḥ śabdasya tātparyaviṣayo jātaḥ kiṃ vṛttyantarakalpanayeti /
GK16visa05cu:192: sa śabdārtha ityasya vākyasya tatparatvamarthaḥ tadeva tatparatvaṃ pṛcchati---kimidamiti /
GK16visa05cu:196: tadanyā vā iti tātparyākhyā vṛttiḥ saṃsargaṃ bodhayitvā vyaṅgyārthamapi bodhayatīti dhvanikena yaduktaṃ tacca prāgeva dūṣitam /
GK16visa05cu:206: nanvastu yugapadeva tātparyaśaktyā vibhāvādisaṃsargasya rasādeśca prakāśanam-iti cet ?
GK16visa05cu:213: (vi, ṭa) nanu atiriktapadārtharūpā turīyā vūttirdhvanikena nocyate,
GK16visa05cu:219: rasaniṣpattirityatra rasasya jñānaniṣpattireva niṣpattiḥ svaprakāśasya svajñānābhinnatvāt /
GK16visa05cu:229_0: kiñca, “yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ“iti nyāyamaṅgīkurvatāṃ vyañjanānaṅgīkāre vānīrakuñja
GK16visa05cu:229_1: ityādau guṇībhūtaḥ pratīyamānor'thaḥ prathamamavataran śabdasya tatparatvābhāvāt
GK16visa05cu:236: “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau taṭādyarthamātrabodhaviratāyā lakṣaṇāyāśca kutaḥ śītatvapāvanatvādivyaṅgyabodhakatā /
GK16visa05cu:252: (vi, ḍa) nanu abhidhā lakṣaṇā ca dīrghatarībhūtaiva vyaṅgyārthaṃ bodhayatu,
GK16visa05cu:254: śabdasya viramyavyāpārastu bhavanmate vyaṅgyabodhana iva svīkārya ityato vaidharmyādeva vācyavyaṅgyabodhakavyāpārayorbhedaṃ sādhayati /
GK16visa05cu:265: bhinno 'bhidheyato vyaṅgya iti---yadyapi abhidhāvyañjanayoreva bhedaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ,
GK16visa05cu:266: tathāpi tadbhedapradarśanenaiva tadvodhakasyāpi bhedaḥ pradarśita ityāśayena itthamuktam /
GK16visa05cu:280: vaiyākaraṇa hi padasya padavācyārthasya jñānamātre nipuṇāḥ,
GK16visa05cu:294: vidhirūpe vācye jñāte sati niṣedhirūpatayā vyaṅgyo jñāyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:300: “gato 'stakarkaḥ” ityādau ca vācyor'tha eka eva pratīyate /
GK16visa05cu:329: “kassa va ṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇapiāeṃ savvaṇaṃ aharaṃ /
GK16visa05cu:335: (vi, da) viṣayabhedaṃ darśayati---“kassa vā ṇa hoi'; iti /
GK16visa05cu:336: kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam ?
GK16visa05cu:341: upanāyakadaṣṭādharāṃ patnīṃ tarjayantaṃ prati nāyikāsakhyāḥ pratāraṇoktiriyam /
GK16visa05cu:350: nāyikayā hi pratīyate iyaṃ pratārayatītyevaṃ vyaṅgyārthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:353: (lo, i) kassa vā ṇeti---vāritādarthād vāme pratikūlakāriṇi /
GK16visa05cu:358: evaṃ boddhṛsvarūpādibhede 'pi yadi vācyavyaṅgyayorekatvaṃ tadā kvacidapi nīlapītādau narapuṅgavādau bhedo na syādityāśayaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:359: nanu gato 'stamarka ityādivākye prakaraṇādirūpajñāpakāntarasahāyenaiva bodhitasya kāntamabhisaretyādivyaṅgyārthasya kathaṃ śabdapramāṇabodhyatvam,
GK16visa05cu:361: iti cedatra kecidāhuḥ-yathā śabdabodhitasya kvacid vācyasyārthasya satyāsatyatvajijñāsāyāṃ satyatvamanumānaviṣaya iti śabdānumānapramāṇayorbhinnaviṣayatvam /
GK16visa05cu:362: vyaṅgyastu eva eva śabdapramāṇena prakaraṇādibodhya iti dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭānti kayorvaiṣamyam /
GK16visa05cu:364_1: śabdasya ekavyaṅgye prakaraṇadisāhāyyasyeti kartavyatārūpatayā śabdasyāṅgatvaṃ svāṅgasya
GK16visa05cu:365: iha ca yadyapi vākyārthasya pratītyanantaraṃ tasya satyāsatyatvajijñāsāyāṃ satyatvaṃ pramāṇāntareṇānumānenaiva bodhyate,
GK16visa05cu:366: tathāpi satyāsatyatvajijñāsātaḥ pūrvamupapannāyā vākyārthapramāyā apramābhāvāt śabdaikasamadhigamyatvācca na śabdaprāmāṇyavyākopaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:367: na hi cakṣurādinā pratītau satyāsatyatvapratyakṣaprāmāṇyaṃ vyākupyeta /
GK16visa05cu:381: (vi, dha) rasādibodhikā na lakṣaṇā nāpi abhidhā sambhavatītyāha--prāgasattvāditi /
GK16visa05cu:382: tatkāvyasthaśabdajanyo yo rasastasya śabdabodhānantarameva janyamānatvāt tatprāk tasyāsattvāt tatra tatkāvyasthaśabdasya śakterlakṣaṇāyā vā grahītumaśaktatvādityarthaḥ;
GK16visa05cu:384: nanu kāvyāt prathamamanubhūyamāno yo rasastanniṣṭhasāmānyadharmarūpayā sāmānyalakṣaṇayā upasthite bhāvinyapi rase śaktigraho 'stviti cenna /
GK16visa05cu:385: śaktyā lakṣaṇayā vā prāthamikarasabodhasyaiva tatsambhavāt prāk tasyānupasthitatvāt vibhāvādivācakaśabdānāṃtatra śaktigrahakatvābhāvāccetyapi bodhyam /
GK16visa05cu:390_0: kintu vibhāvādyabhidhānadvāraiva tatpratīterānubhāvikatvāt nanu iha kāvyasthāt śṛṅgārādiśabdājjñātasya
GK16visa05cu:395: trayāṇāmapi vyaṅgyānāṃ mukhyārthabādhavirahādapi na lakṣaṇā bodhiketi /
GK16visa05cu:400: kiṃñca, yatra“gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādāvupāttaśabdārthānāṃ bubhūṣannevānvayo 'nupapattyā bādhyate tatraiva hi lakṣaṇāyāḥ praveśaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:403: (vi, na) nanu rase 'pi tātparyasattvāllakṣaṇāṃ vinā tadanirvāha eva mukhyārthabādha ucyata ityata āha--na hīti /
GK16visa05cu:404: yadi rasādiśabdāttasya prāgupasthitistadaiva tasya lakṣaṇayā bodhārthamuktarūpamukhyārthabādhanirvacanaṃ saiva tu netyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:429: ityādau padārthānāmanvayakāla eva bādhapratibhāsādyanvayasya vidhurībhāvastadā tena padārthena jalamayādinā ākṣipto yastaṭādistena saṅgatiranvaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:436: ityādau śūnyavāsagṛhādīnāṃ vilokanādyanvayābādhāt na rasalakṣaṇetyaha--na punariti /
GK16visa05cu:441: yadi ca “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau prayojanaṃ lakṣyaṃ syāt,
GK16visa05cu:443: tasyāpi ca lakṣyatayā prayojanāntaraṃ tasyāpi prayojanāntaramityanavasthāpātaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:448: ityādau yat śaityapāvanatvaṃ ca vyaṅgyamuktaṃ tīralakṣaṇānantaraṃ tatrāpi lakṣaṇaivāstu;
GK16visa05cu:452: mukhyārthatvaṃ bādhitatvaṃ ca syāditi---ubhayameva tu nāstīti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:456: (lo, ḷ) nanvevaṃ vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau māstu lakṣaṇā;
GK16visa05cu:457: avivakṣitavācye tu śītatvapāvanatvādirūpaṃ prayojanaṃ lakṣaṇīyamastitvatyāśaṅkyāha---yadi ceti /
GK16visa05cu:458: śabdo hi prathamaṃ mukhyamarthaṃ pratipādya tasya vākyārthānvayānupapattau tatsambandhinamarthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visa05cu:459: iha yadi tīrapratyayānantaraṃ bodhyaṃ prayojanaṃ lakṣayati tadā gaṅgāśabdasya tīraṃ mukhyor'thaḥ syāt /
GK16visa05cu:465: “anavasthā yā mūlakṣatikāriṇī“mūlaṃ hyatra tīraniṣṭasya pāvanatvasya ca pūrvapakṣeṇa lakṣyatvenāṅgīkāraḥ /
GK16visa05cu:468: na cāpi prayojanaviśiṣṭa eva tīre lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa05cu:470: nīlādisaṃvedanānantarameva hi jñātatāyā anuvyavasāyasya vā saṃbhavaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:473: (vi, bha) nanu lakṣyārthabodhānantaraṃ yadi prayojane lakṣaṇā tadaivānavasthā;
GK16visa05cu:474: śītapāvane tīre ghoṣa ityevaṃ prayojanaviśiṣṭa eva lakṣaṇāstvityata āha---na cāpīti /
GK16visa05cu:475: tatra gaṅgātīre ghoṣa ityato 'dhikārthasya pratītiḥ prayojanamiti kāvyaprakāśakṛduktaṃ prayojanamanusandheyam /
GK16visa05cu:483_0: iti cet--lakṣaṇayā yatpāvanatvaviśiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ janayitavyaṃ tatprayojanībhūtaṃ jñānaṃ
GK16visa05cu:483_1: ca tadeva paryavasitamityataḥ kāryakāraṇayorabhedāpattireva bījamiti sarvatra tu
GK16visa05cu:486: naiyāyikānāṃ murāreśca mate 'nuvyavasāyaḥ tādṛśakāryakāraṇayośca kramotpattireva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:490: iha caitadviśiṣṭameva taṭaṃ lakṣaṇā bodhayatu kiṃ vṛttyantareṇa ?
GK16visa05cu:492: gaṅgātādātmyapratītyā ca taṭasya daivasiddhameva śaityādiviśiṣṭatvamityāśaṅkyāha--na cāpīti---prayojanaviśiṣṭe 'pi lakṣaṇaityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:496: ābhāsatvena hetūnāṃ smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ // VisSd_5.4 //
GK16visa05cu:502: rasādīnāṃ ratyādīnāṃ vyaṅgyānāṃ bodhanakṣamaṃ bodhakāraṇaṃ nānumānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:507: kintu śabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyatvena vyañjanayā śābdabodhaviṣayo ratyādirbhāvukairbhāvyamānaḥ svaprakāśānandamayatvena pariṇata āsvādyamāno rasaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:510: tathā ca tādṛśarasasya hetūnāṃ ratyādikāryakāraṇasahakārirūpāṇāṃ vibhāvādānāmābhāsatvena nānumānaṃ nānumitirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:511: tathā hi vibhāvādayaḥ sītādayo hetavo mutubarthadidṛkṣādisambandhena rāmādivṛttayaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:512: sādhyastūktarūpo rasaḥ kāvyaboddhaniṣṭha ityato hetūnāṃ viruddhatvamasiddhiśceti hetvābhāsatā /
GK16visa05cu:514: rasādibuddhiḥ smṛtirūpāpi netyāha--smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ iti /
GK16visa05cu:520_0: (lo, ai) evaṃ vyaṅgyasyāsya prācīnavedyatvaṃ nirasya mahimabhaṭṭena khalu rasavastvalaṅkāravyañjakānāṃ
GK16visa05cu:522: vyaktivivekakāreṇa hi--“yāpi vibhāvādibhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ sānumāna evāntarbhavitumarhati /
GK16visa05cu:524: te hi ratyādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ kāraṇakāryasahakāribhūtāstānanumāpayanta eva rasādīnniṣpādayanti /
GK16visa05cu:525: ta eva pratīyamānā āsvādapadavī gatāḥ santo lasā ucyante,
GK16visa05cu:535: ta eva anumīyamānā ratyādaya eva punaḥ punaranuśīlanādāsvādyapadavīṃ gatāḥ santo jñānasambandhena sāmājikaniṣṭharasatāmāpadyanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:542: kintu vibhāvādibhireva ratyādirvyajyata ityave bhramo jāyata ityāha---yato 'yamadyāpīti /
GK16visa05cu:562: ratyāderanumānaṃ vyañjanā ceti vivādo nāpātata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:563: tadaivātra vivādaḥ syād yadā rāmādigataratyādivyañjanaṃ mayā rasatvenoktasyāt,
GK16visa05cu:566: tataśca vyaṅgyaratyādireva sāmājikaratyādāvabhedenā'pyamāṇo rasanākhyavyāpāreṇāsvādyamāno rasa iti rasanirūpaṇaprastāvoktasiddhāntaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:581: “yatra yatraivaṃvidhānāṃ vibhāvānubhāvasāttvikasañcāriṇāmabhidhānamabhinayo vā tatra tatra śṛṅgārādirasāvirbhāvaḥ” iti sugrahaiva vyāptiḥ pakṣadharmatā ca /
GK16visa05cu:584: (vi, va) vyaktivivekakāreṇa sambandhaviśeṣaṇavibhāvādīnāṃ yathoktānandarūpasavyāpyatā pakṣadharmatā ca sādhyate,
GK16visa05cu:595: (lo, au) atra mahimabhaṭṭadarśitāṃ vyāptiṃ dūṣayitvā vyāptigrahaṇābhāvaṃ draḍhayati--yaccetyādi /
GK16visa05cu:606: arthāntarasya rasasyābhivyaktau āsvādane nibandhanakāraṇaṃ vo yuṣmākaṃ yā sāmagrīṣṭā saiva vibhāvādirūpā sāmagrī no 'smākaṃ mate gamakatvena anumāpakatvena sammateryarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:609: arthāntarābhivyaktau yā sāmagrī kāraṇam iṣṭā saivāsmākamanumitau liṅgamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:610: sāmagrībhāve 'pi hi vyaṅgyārthapratipattau yataḥ kutaścidapi yadeva tadeva pratīyate /
GK16visa05cu:612: tasya vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vinā ābhāsataiva syāditi bhavatāmapi vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vinā vyaṅgyajñānaṃ na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:629: vastutastu sāmājike sātrātkriyamāṇaḥ svaprakāśānando 'numīyata eva na,
GK16visa05cu:633: tathā jñātavibhāvādirūpā sāmagrī rasāboddhurjanasyāpyastīti vyabhicāraśceti bodhyam /
GK16visa05cu:648: (vi, sa) yatra vastuno 'laṅkārasya vā vyañjanā tatra vastvalaṅkārau anumānagamyau eveti naiyāyikamataṃ dūṣayitumutthāmapayati---yacceti /
GK16visa05cu:655: jalakelau śrīkṛṣṇena svīyakaradattajalena rādhikāmukhacandraṃ punaḥ purabhiṣicya svīyakareṇa pidhīyate ca mucyate ca /
GK16visa05cu:657: pidhāne rātrau virahiṇastasya prātaḥ kālabhramāt saṃghaṭanam,
GK16visa05cu:661: tatkarasya jalakelitaralatve kṛṣṇamukhasyaiva sicyamānatvasambhavena svamukhasya pidhānāyogāt /
GK16visa05cu:662: yad vā--rādhikāreṇa pidhānamocanayorapi jalasekadvārā kṛṣṇakaraprayojyatvāttaddvārā kṛṣṭakareṇaiva pidhānamocane /
GK16visa05cu:664: atra śloke mukhe candrarūpaṇam ādipadadvayāt ślokāntare alaṅkārāntaramityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:666: (lo, i) evaṃ rasāderanumānāgocaratvaṃ vyavasthāpya vastvalaṅkārayorapi vyaṅgyayostaddarśayati---yacceti /
GK16visa05cu:672: rādhikāmukhasya candratvasya vyaṅgyatvāccandradarśanādarśanābhāyāṃ hi rātrisadbhāvābhāvabuddhyā cakavākayorvighanasaṃghaṭane bhavataḥ /
GK16visa05cu:677: (vi, ha) tatra vasturūpaṃ vyaṅgyamupakramya tasyānumeyatāṃ ghaṭayati---tathā hīti /
GK16visa05cu:682: pakṣe parvatādau sapakṣe mahānasādau ca vipakṣe jalahradādau vvāvṛttatvam /
GK16visa05cu:683: liṅgād vyāpyād dhūmādeḥ liṅgini vyāpake vahnyādau /
GK16visa05cu:690: (vi, ka) liṅgyasya trirūpatā ca sādhyavyāptisattve eva sambhavatīti /
GK16visa05cu:704: tasmādatra yadvācyārthālliṅgarūpālliṅgino vyaṅgyārthasyāvagamastadanumāna eva paryavasyati” iti /
GK16visa05cu:714: pakṣe godāvarītīranikuñjarūpe āśraye sāmarthyādavaseya iti na khalu sapakṣasattvavipakṣavyāvṛttatvābhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:717: tanna, tathā hyatra “bhama ammia-” ityādau (242 pṛdṛ)
GK16visa05cu:718: gṛhe śvanivṛttyā vihitaṃ bhramaṇaṃ godāvarītīre siṃhopalabdherabhramaṇamanumāpayati” iti yadvaktavyaṃ tatrānaikāntiko hetuḥ /
GK16visa05cu:729: kuto na yuktamityāha--tathā hīti atra--gṛhe iti /
GK16visa05cu:730: ayamarthaḥ--yasya khalu bhīrorgṛhe śvanivṛttyā bhramaṇaṃ vihitaṃ sa kathaṃ saṃhopalabdhisthāne bhramiṣyati /
GK16visa05cu:733: bhīrorapi guroḥ prabhorvā nideśena priyānurāgeṇa vā gamanasya saṃbhavāt,
GK16visa05cu:734: puścalyā vacanaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ na veti saṃdigdhāsiddheśca /
GK16visa05cu:741: pakṣe godāvarītīre hetoḥ siṃhasattvasya sandehāt sāndigdhāsiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:746: kiñca ya khalu vīraḥ sparśādiśaṅkayā śuno bibheti sa saṃhasadbhāvasthānaṃ pratyuta mṛgayādikutūhalena gacchatīti darśanādviruddho bhramaṇarūpasādhyaviruddhasya sādhanāt /
GK16visa05cu:748: “jalakeli-” ityatra “ya ātmadarśanādarśanābhyāṃ cakravākavighaṭasaṃghaṭanakārī sa candra eva” ityanumitireveyamiti na vācyam,
GK16visa05cu:761: (lo, ḷ) uttrāsakaḥ--yasya karatāladānādinotrāsena pakṣiṇo na ghaṭante,
GK16visa05cu:770: ābhāsamāna ābhāsau hetorupalabhyamāno vyabhicāraḥ kokatrāsakavṛttiḥ svadarśanādarśanarūpaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:788: (vi, cha) ślokāntarepi vyaṅgyāntarasyānumeyatāṃ hetorvyabhicāreṇa dūṣayitumāha--tathā yaddṛṣṭimiti /
GK16visa05cu:791: iyaṃ parakāmukopabhogecchāvatī nalagranthinā stanadāraṇasambhāvanāsattve 'pi strotogamane ekākipravṛttatvād iti /
GK16visa05cu:792: granthakṛtastu stanāghātastrotogamanayoḥ pṛthakkathane 'pa na pṛthak hetudvayam /
GK16visa05cu:806: (vi, ja) niḥ śeṣacyutetyādāvapi dūtyāstatkāmukopabhogasya vyaṅgyasyānumeyatāṃ dūṣayitumāha---yacceti /
GK16visa05cu:812: (vi, jha) ādyayorna vivāda iti---dūtikartṛkamanumānaṃ tāvanna sambhavatyeva,
GK16visa05cu:814: tatkāle sannihatajanastu yadi na vyaṅgyaboddhā tadā tasyānumānamapi nāstītyatastatrāpi navivādaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:815: yadi tu vyaṅgyaboddhā tadā tṛtīyapakṣe evāntarbhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:819: tadviraheṇektasya candanacyavanāderupabhogavyāpyatā nāstīti tatraiva vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:821: (lo, o) na vivāda iti---na khalu vayaṃ dūtyāstatkalasannihitānāṃ vānumānaṃ nirākurmaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:826: nanu vaktrādyavasthāsahakṛtatvena viśeṣyo heturiti na vācyam /
GK16visa05cu:835: (lo, au) nanviti---vaktrī yādṛśīmavasthāṃ prāpya tathoktavatī sāvasthā hetorviśeṣaṇīkartavyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:845: kiñcaivaṃvidhānāṃ kāvyānāṃ kavipratibhāmātrajanmanāṃ prāmāṇyānāvaśyakatvena saṃdigdhāsiddhatvaṃ hetoḥ /
GK16visa05cu:856: tena ca tatkāntasyādhamatvaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ na veti kathamanumānam /
GK16visa05cu:859: (vi, ḍa) nanu vyabhicāriṇa sandigdhena vā candanacyavanādinā kathamupabhogasya bhavanmate vyañjanāpītyata āha---vyaktivādinā ceti /
GK16visa05cu:862: na hyanumāna iva vyañjanāyāmapi vyabhicārādikamaṅgamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:863: anumānapakṣe adhamasaninahitapreṣitatve satīti viśeṣaṇadānamapi na sambhavatītyāha---tena ceti /
GK16visa05cu:866: adhamatvasya prāmāṇikatvepi tasya dūtīgamanecchārāditye sati tāvatāpyanumānāsambhava ityapi bodhyam /
GK16visa05cu:891: (lo, ī) yadi khalu pūrvaṃ jīvataḥ kutrāpi sthānamavagacchet /
GK16visa05cu:892: arthapattisvarūpaṃ hi--dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā anyathā nopapadyate iti,
GK16visa05cu:895: pratyakṣānumānopamānārthāpattyabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ pramāṇairupalabdhaḥ śabdasya ca prādhānyakhyāpanārthaṃ bhedena nirdiśati--śruta iti /
GK16visa05cu:896: śruta iti śabdalakṣaṇena jñātor'thor'thaviśeṣo 'nyathā nopapadyata iti /
GK16visa05cu:897: śābdī hyākāṅkṣā śabdenaiva prapūryata iti darśanāt /
GK16visa05cu:899: ityatra rātrau bhuṅkte iti vākyaśeṣaḥ kalpyate /
GK16visa05cu:904: śabdo hi kalpyater'thapratītyai viprakṛtasādhanaṃ tadvaram arthe eva kalpyatāmiti /
GK16visa05cu:913: jīvaṃścaitro 'tra goṣṭhyāṃ na vidyata ityatra kutrāpyavasthāne pūrvānubhavyāptimupajīvyaivārthāpatteḥ pravṛttiriti /
GK16visa05cu:922: (vi, ta) sūcanā nāma kaścid vyāpāraḥ kaiściducyate tadgamya eva vyaṅgyārthaḥ iti mataṃ dūṣayitumāha---kiñceti /
GK16visa05cu:926: tathā ca yadyaṅgulitolanādau vyabhicāraśaṅkā na bhavati tatrānumānam /
GK16visa05cu:931: saṃketādilaukikapramāṇāsāpekṣatvenetyanena yatra yatrāṃ rdhvatarjanī tatra tatra daśaṃsakhyeti punargṛhītavyāptiruraskāravacanam /
GK16visa05cu:937: (vi, tha) rasādibuddheḥ smṛtirūpatvaṃ saṃskārajanyatvenānumanyamānānāṃ mataṃ duṣayitumāha---tatrāpīti /
GK16visa05cu:940: kintu svaprakāśānandasvarūpasya rasasya smṛtītvāsambhava eva doṣaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:942: (lo, ū) smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ itikārikāpadārthaṃ viśadayati--yañceti /
GK16visa05cu:943: anaikāntikatvaṃ so 'yaṃ devadatta ityādijñānarūpāyāḥ pratyabhijñāyā api saṃskārajanyatvāt
GK16visa05cu:946: ca dvitāyārtho nāstyeva---iti yaduktaṃ mahimabhaṭaṭena tadanubhavasiddhimapalapato gajanimīlikaiva /
GK16visa05cu:949: (vi, da) dvitīyārtho maheśarūpo nāstyeveti---buddhiviṣayo nāstyevetyarthaḥ apalapata ityasya,
GK16visa05cu:953: (lo, ṛ) gajanimīlikaiveti--paryālocanaṃ vināpi lokāpavādaśaṅkayā mattagajavaccakṣuṣī nimilya vacanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:955_1: cānumānādipramāṇāvedyatayā cābhidhādivṛttitrayābodhyatayā ca turīyā vṛttirupāsyaiveti siddham /
GK16visa05cu:961: iyaṃ ca vyāptyādyanusandhānaṃ vināpi bhavatītyakhilaṃ nirmalam /
GK16visa05cu:964: (lo, ḷ) na ca śabdasamarpitasya vibhāvāderjñānasyaiva rasāderjanakatvāt kāvyamatra sākṣānna hetutvena vyāpriyata iti vācyam;
GK16visa05cu:965_1: bhāvakatvāt yathā svārthasya jñānadvāreṇa tatsaṃsargaṃ bhāvayatāṃ padānāmeva karaṇatvābhāyupagamo
GK16visa05cu:966: kiñca sadvārakaraṇam iti nyāyenāntarālavartivyāpārāntaravirahādasambhāvyaṃ vibhāvādisaṃvalanajñānasyāsvādaṃ prati kāraṇatvam /
GK16visa05cu:967: nanvevaṃ vyāptyādyanusandhānamantareṇākasmād vācyārthasyāvagatau kathaṃ nātiprasaṅga ityāśaṅkyāha--iyaṃ ceti /
GK16visa05cu:972: rasavyaktau punarvṛttiṃ rasanākhyāṃ pare viduḥ // VisSd_5.5 //
GK16visa05cu:976: (vi, dha) rasavyañjanāyā rasanetyapi nāma kecidāhurityāha---rasavyaktau punariti /
GK16visa05cu:980: smṛtyupanayasahakāreṇa bodhanaṃ tu vyaṅgyārthasya pūvānubhavābhāvena smaraṇāsambhāvanayaiva nirastam /
GK16visa05cu:981: nahyuktānandarūpo raso dūtyādeḥ kāmukasambhogādirūpor'tho vā pūrvamanubhūtaḥ /
GK16visa05cu:989: iti sāhityadarpaṇalocane vyañjanāvyāpārasthāpano nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ
GK16visa05cu:991: iti sahityarpaṇo vyañjanāvyāpāranirūpaṇo nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
